name: Timberman-8
description:
Inspired by https://store.steampowered.com/app/398710/Timberman/?l=german

You are a Timberman and you can move left and right. when moving you are chopping the bottom tile ob a tree and the nict tiles from above move down. You have to avoid the sticks of the tree.

This game was made for getting in touch with pico8 for upcoming gamejams.

feel free to play, donate and writing comments. Follow me on Twitter (@technokrat)
